definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical and electroencephalographic characteristics of automatism.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析癲自動症的臨牀和腦電圖特徵。

sentences.english: Electroencephalograms examine shows moderate or severe abnormality.
sentences.chinese: 腦電圖檢查可發現中度或高度異常。

sentences.english: To explore the value of electroencephalogram(EEG) after depriving sleep in the diagnosis of epilepsy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討剝奪睡眠腦電圖在小兒癲癇診斷中的價值。

sentences.english: Objective To explore change of sleep electroencephalography in depressions with physical anxiety.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討軀體焦慮性抑鬱症病人的睡眠腦電圖改變。

sentences.english: Then, see if those patterns are generalizable — if everyone has similar patterns.
sentences.chinese: 之後，看看這些腦電圖是否存在一些共性。

sentences.english: Objective To explore clinical characteristics and changes of electroencephalography (EEG) in children with migraine.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討兒童偏頭痛臨牀特點和腦電圖變化。

sentences.english: Aim: To investigate the value of video electroencephalogram in diagnosis of epilepsy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討錄像腦電圖在癔症的鑑別診斷中的作用。

sentences.english: Methods To analyze clinical and electroencephalographic data of 36 BECT patients.
sentences.chinese: 方法分析36例BECT患者的臨牀及腦電圖資料。

sentences.english: That fiction, though, is often based on a real technique known as electroencephalography .
sentences.chinese: 而這種幻想是建立在現實中的腦電圖技術之上的。

sentences.english: One such clever method is an EEG.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個巧妙的方法是腦電圖。

sentences.english: Brain scans and EEGs (Electro-encephalograms or brain wave tracings) are not helpful in working out whether a person has ADHD.
sentences.chinese: 腦掃描和腦電圖對多動症確診沒有幫助。

sentences.english: The appearances of abnormal EEG were mainly slow wave and local epileptiform discharge.
sentences.chinese: 腦電圖異常表現爲瀰漫性慢波增多和侷限性癇性放電。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical value of electroencephalograph in diagnosis of viral encephalitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腦電圖在病毒性腦炎診斷中的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To explore characteristic of sleep electroencephalograph in depressives with and without early awakening .
sentences.chinese: 目的探索伴和不伴早醒的抑鬱症患者睡眠腦電圖特徵。

sentences.english: Conclusion EEGs were fundamental criterion in diagnosis of seizure .
sentences.chinese: 結論腦電圖是診斷癲癇的根本依據。

sentences.english: After the Lactone Coriariainjections, the EEG of all the rabbits showed the characteristics of theepilepsy type.
sentences.chinese: 注射馬桑內酯後，家兔腦電圖均出現癇性放電。
